txt.en:
'[placeholder]! During my time in the catacombs, I have learned that there are areas that contain information and objects that are impossible to find elsewhere. Some time ago, I travelled here and began establishing a small encampment to gather this information so that it can be put to good use.

'Sadly, many times, this information can be found in the most dangerous places. In this case, I believe that relics of a bygone age can be recovered from Jâx Ugikh.

'Could you recover some of these relics and return them to me so I could continue my research?'
Recover relics from cultists spread throughout Kamrabezûr.
Talk to Azrât in Kên Taghlim
Collect relics from cultists in Kamrabezûr ([placeholder]/[placeholder])

You present the relics to Azrât.

'My goodness, [placeholder]! These relics will provide a great deal of context and information about the ancient origins of Jâx Ugikh.

'Thank you for your help!'
Azrât is at Kên Taghlim in Kamrabezûr.\n\nNow that you have collected the relics, you should return them to her.
Cultists throughout Kamrabezûr have gathered valuable artifacts throughout the area. Gather these objects and return them, so that Azrât continue her research.
